m_szDocTitle: World’s Cheapest Solar Power Project In Dubai Achieves Financial Closure | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: World’s Cheapest Solar Power Project In Dubai Achieves Financial Closure July 21st, 2015 by Smiti Mittal   The world’s cheapest solar power project being built in Dubai is one step closer to commercial operation, the Dubai Electricity and Water Authority has reported. The 200 MW second phase of the Mohammad Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Solar Park being implemented by Saudi Arabia-based ACWA Power has achieved financial closure. The project was awarded to ACWA Power earlier this year at a record-low tariff of US¢5.98/kWh. The 200 MW capacity would add to the 13 MW phase I project that is already opera
